content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I think 2000 Euros would be a good starting point. Remember, this is a one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll find it a great investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While the central location and amenities sound attractive, I find the proposed price of 2000 Euros too steep for my budget at this moment. I'd like to explore lower options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Very well, Yi-Nuo Wang. How about we drop it down to 1900 Euros? I'm sure you'll agree that the location and amenities of this apartment are worth a high price. I'm just trying to get the best deal for myself, after all.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Although the apartment offers excellent convenience, I'm still looking to minimize my expenses. I would prefer to negotiate further and see if we can reach an even more affordable price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your need to minimize expenses, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I'm trying to get the best deal for myself. How about we go with 1800 Euros? It's a good price for a newly built, unfurnished apartment in the city center, don't you think? Remember, location is everything.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I acknowledge the importance of location, I'm still seeking a lower price to fit my financial requirements better. Let's continue discussing this to find a mutually agreeable number.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I'm trying to get the best deal for myself. How about we go with 1700 Euros? I believe this is a fair price for the apartment's location and amenities. Remember, this is a one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll find it a great investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your emphasis on the apartment's location and amenities is noted. However, my budget constraints still prompt me to explore further reductions. Let's try and narrow the gap even more to reach a price that works for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your need to minimize expenses, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I'm trying to get the best deal for myself. How about we go with 1600 Euros? I believe this is a fair price for the apartment's location and amenities. Remember, this is a one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll find it a great investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your persistence in offering a reasonable price for this well-located apartment is appreciated. While it's a tough decision, I'm inclined to accept your offer of 1600 Euros. I agree to the price of 1600 Euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1600] Euro! Congratulations, Yi-Nuo Wang, you're the new tenant of my apartment. I'm sure we'll have a smooth tenancy relationship.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
